Package de.chojo.sadu.wrapper.stage

Interface ResultStage<T>

Type Parameters:
T - return type
All Known Implementing Classes:
QueryBuilder
public interface ResultStage<T>
Represents a ResultStage of a QueryBuilder.

A ResultStage is used to read the result set, perform updates or append another query.

Can forward to a RetrievalStage when data needs to be read, a UpdateStage when data is updated or deleted or a InsertStage when data gets inserted.

Additionally, it allows to go back to a QueryStage to add another query into the transaction.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    QueryStage<T> append()
    Append another query to the query builder.
    default UpdateStage delete()
    Mark this query as deletion query.
    InsertStage insert()
    Insert data into a table.
    default RetrievalStage<T> map()
    Maps the rows of the result with a previously registered RowMapper.
    RetrievalStage<T> map​(MapperConfig mapperConfig)
    Maps the rows of the result with a previously registered RowMapper.
    default RetrievalStage<T> map​(Consumer<MapperConfig> mapperConfig)
    Maps the rows of the result with a previously registered RowMapper.
    RetrievalStage<T> readRow​(ThrowingFunction<T,​Row,​SQLException> mapper)
    Extract results from the current row and only the current row.
    UpdateStage update()
    Mark this query as update query.

  • Method Details

    • readRow

      @CheckReturnValue RetrievalStage<T> readRow​(ThrowingFunction<T,​Row,​SQLException> mapper)
      Extract results from the current row and only the current row. It doesn't matter if you will get 0, 1 or more results.

      This is not the place to define how many results you want.

      Do not try to read multiple rows here.

      Do not modify the underlying result set.

      Parameters:
      mapper - mapper to map the current row.
      Returns:
      The QueryBuilder in a RetrievalStage to retrieve the row/s.

    • map

      default RetrievalStage<T> map()
      Maps the rows of the result with a previously registered RowMapper.

      The best matching mapper will be used for the result set.

      Returns:
      The QueryBuilder in a RetrievalStage to retrieve the row/s.

    • map

      RetrievalStage<T> map​(MapperConfig mapperConfig)
      Maps the rows of the result with a previously registered RowMapper.

      Maps the row and applies a mapper config to the query builder.

      Parameters:
      mapperConfig - mapper config
      Returns:
      The QueryBuilder in a RetrievalStage to retrieve the row/s.

    • map

      default RetrievalStage<T> map​(Consumer<MapperConfig> mapperConfig)
      Maps the rows of the result with a previously registered RowMapper.

      Maps the row and applies a mapper config to the query builder.

      Parameters:
      mapperConfig - modify the mapper config
      Returns:
      The QueryBuilder in a RetrievalStage to retrieve the row/s.

    • update

      @CheckReturnValue UpdateStage update()
      Mark this query as update query.
      Returns:
      The QueryBuilder in a UpdateStage to update the data.

    • delete

      @CheckReturnValue default UpdateStage delete()
      Mark this query as deletion query. Alias for update()
      Returns:
      The QueryBuilder in a UpdateStage to update the data.

    • insert

      @CheckReturnValue InsertStage insert()
      Insert data into a table. Alias for update()
      Returns:
      The QueryBuilder in a InsertStage to update the data.

    • append

      @CheckReturnValue QueryStage<T> append()
      Append another query to the query builder.
      Returns:
      The QueryBuilder in a QueryStage
